abstrac: Offering 15 years plus expertise in Legal, Business, Always on Time & Quality!
bio:
Dear Visitor,

Thank you for visiting my profile! 

I am, solo legal & business freelancer operating, my own account from India, would like to seek your kind co-operation and in return, I promise to offer better qualitative work in comparison to outsourcing organization having little or no knowledge about subjects they are working, they recruit non-legal persons to cut costs, and you are at the receiving end. They very well may win a dispute, even if you sue them, under professional protection but if you lose your investor or client you lose it forever being small business this issue struck us all, Thus always work with real providers not outsourcer!

I believe if you cannot approach me anytime then the purpose of this profile is lost!

I can help you with legal documentation and advice, business consulting and creative writings! Furthermore, I have more than 15 years of experience (Since 2007 when I have started working for a rights' organization)

In terms of legal work, I can help you with all sorts of drafting be it shareholder, partnership, web terms, privacy or business policy, legal letter for claim, bankruptcy filing documents etc. I have clients all over the world US, UK, Canada, Australia, Belgium, Russian Federation, UAE, Israel and I love to grow further… I personally manage all project work. 

I hold two professional degree:
1. Bachelor of Arts and Law, 2008, Calcutta University
2. Masters in Business 2013, Sikkim Manipal University, Distance Learning. 

And some cool degrees from Alison, which you can check at my LinkedIn profile so attached!



Love to resolve your issues, 

I need more of your best wishes, prayers amidst the devastation all around!

Thank you for your time

Shekhar Mahapatra
 India, West Bengal

I am available 7 days a week. Milestone is required to begin with any work! Best Time to contact 9am-11pm Indian Time.

Payment and Terms:
 Work will commence once you formally share your requirement and create the requested milestone!

Feel free to share your requirement, and I'm flexible to make changes as per your business requirement etc.!

 Please note, all revision request will be entertained if it's requested within 7 days  of receiving the draft or as per agreed page size or volume so prepared at first hand. If you require any revision after 7 days of the drafted document being received by you, or if it required additions and alternation beyond agreed volume, or requires more than agreed revision, then you are required to pay additional charges.

At any point of time, you can always write back to me in regard to any query and confusion. 

Open door policy is enforced here in letter and spirit ! Any time and every time, feel free to contact!

abstrac: I believe in smart and clean Coding.
bio:
Freelancer developer with a work experience of 10 years in development field and I am experienced in CORE PHP,  AJAX, JAVASCRIPT, JQUERY, MySql, MVC Frame-works, SEO, SMO, WORDPRESS, DRUPAL, MAGENTO, along with other open source currently used.
2018: After working as a freelancer I think I have to increase my team so now I have a small team with me. So We can do any kind of Graphic work, Sales work for you.

FIXED PRICE PROJECTS
We prefer to have funds in safe pay before starting the work. Payment release of project will be divided on basis of milestones delivery. 

Projects Less Than $500
Safe pay Escrow the total amount and keep releasing once the Milestones are covered.

For Projects More than $500
25% Upfront Amount To start The Project
25% Once the first Milestone is covered
25% The Second Milestone is Complete
25% Once the Project is Complete

HOURLY (TIME & MATERIAL)
We will send you a weekly status report and a time-sheet. Invoice will be weekly or 2 times a month.

WARRANTY
We provide warranty for all fixed-price projects and support upto 2 month if you get any bugs in Development work.

COMMUNICATION
Skype, GTalk, Email, Telephone, Various other Chat tools.

AVAILABILITY
24x7. We will schedule time to discuss project details/progress during your working hours.

porfolio.title: Blockchain Play to Earn NFT Game

bio:
I am a senior full-stack software developer and have been working with development for 8 years.

My main works are web, blockchain development and sometimes I am enjoying and developing game using Unity3D, Cocos Creator, UE4, 5.

1. I am very familiar with web development.
Mostly, I worked with JavaScript frameworks such as React, Next.js, React Hook, Angular, Vue.js, Node.js and Express.js.
Also I worked with PHP, CI, Laravel, Django and Ruby on Rails.

2. And I am very good at blockchain development.
I have completed many blockchain dapps such as NFT minting, NFT marketplace, DeFi, Dex, Dao and P2E games.
In most projects, I worked on smart contract and web development as a senior full-stack developer.
While I develop projects, I learnt smart contract optimization, integration front-end and smart contract.
Now, I can handle most blockchain projects

3. I am also good at game development.
I am very interested in game development and completed some game projects.
So I can handle most game types such as FPS, TPS, MMO, RPG, Metaverse and so on

These are my skillsets

✅Blockchain skills
• Solana, Ethereum, BSC, Polygon, EOS, WAX, Smart Contract, web3.js, ethers.js, Truffle, Remix, Hardhat.

✅Frontend skills
• React.js, Redux, React Hook, Next.js, Vue.js, Vuex, Angular, Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Three.js
• Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, Styled Components, Sass, MUI, Antd

✅Backend skills
• Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, Laravel, Django, Java, Spring boot, Ruby on Rails

✅Database
• MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, SQLite, Oracle, SQL Server, Firebase, AWS

✅Game development skill
• Unity, Unreal Engine Cocos2d-x, Cocos Creator, Godot
• Photon, Mirror, Unet, Atavism, SFS, Playfab, Firebase

Why choose me?
✅I provide very clean and optimized code
✅I can provide a solid 8 hours a day for 7 days of availability.
✅All work is guaranteed to meet your expectations.
✅Your project will be completed on time and within specified budget.

My main and first goal is 100% client satisfaction.

40+hours/week
Long term available

abstrac: I'm a professional artist and illustrator.
bio: I draw and paint already for more then 15 years and can’t stop doing that. My scope of work includes children's book illustration, editorial illustration, patterns, web illustration and other. For the illustration I combine in my work watercolour painting, classical drawing, and digital art techniques. As an artist I’m found of landscapes and nature. I always search for a beauty and harmony in a space around me. For this part of my art I use traditional technique: oil on canvas, watercolour on cotton paper. Behind the art I’m a mother of three beautiful children.
I prefer to get paid for a work, not per hour, easy in communication, always try to find the best decision for the project, always keep in touch.

abstrac: Highest quality Software Development at the best price!
bio:
I am a Senior Web and Cloud developer. I have a Bachelor in Computer Science (1996) and a Master in Applied Computers (1999) with specialization in Databases. I have 20 years of software development experience 18 of them doing web programming and since year 2000 working with the Microsoft stack.

I am part of the Azure FastTrack team at Microsoft, and since 2008 I have also been a member of the Visual Studio, MSDN and Azure DevOps teams.

I am experienced in Services and Web development using C#, NodeJs, Python, ASP.NET MVC, Java, .Net Core, Azure, AWS, SQL Server, JavaScript, JQuery, Angular, ReactJS, Blazor. I use Agile methodologies like Scrum, plan the work on Sprints and code on the Cloud using Git as the Source Control as well as JIRA, Asana or Azure DevOps as work item trackers. I keep constant communication with my clients via daily Standups and Scrum planning meetings.

I am located in Seattle.
